inclusion.criterion: Retrospectively, all patients examined from January 1, 2000 to November 2014 will be
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: included in the echocardiography laboratory whose objective examination is a narrowing of the aortic valve (maximum transaortic velocity ≥2.5 m / s).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Aortic stenosis may be known in the past.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Refusal of the patient to participate in the study.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have previously had aortic valve surgery before being examined in the echocardiography laboratory.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function and EF of 25%. He underwent cardiac cath with right heart cath to evaluate pulm art pressures.
